title: (Fri Full) Someone on the Show is Going to Hollywood + The Longest Round of Easy Trivia EVER!
itunes:title: (Fri Full) Someone on the Show is Going to Hollywood + The Longest Round of Easy Trivia EVER!
description:
Bobby reveals that he has been approached by a major streaming service that is interested in one of the members of the show. He doesn’t say who yet…but someone is going to Hollywood! We play an intense round of our traditional Friday game, Easy Trivia!

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
